Name: Drift Experience Japan: Supporter Edition
About the game: Drift Experience Japan is a small, experience oriented game. Experience modern Assets developed by gifted creators using the unreal Engine 5. Drift Experience Japan: Supporter Edition gives you extra content to your game and a Bonus Mode. Experience the roads around Haruna, Hakone, Gunma, a garage, a practice- and a race track. Tracks Choose between the tracks and select day and at night settings. Drift The car has an challenging arcade drift handling and can be controlled by keyboard or gamepad. It may take some to time to get used to it. Customization Fully customize your car. Change tires, different body parts, paint. Customization is available in Gunma, Haruna, garage and on practice track. Use a prebuild setup in Hakone and on the race track with modified setups! Bonus Bonus RC Stunt Mode: Try to collect all stars! 6 circuits day / night settings for 4 circuits car customizing in 3 circuits (Haruna, Gunma, Practice) challenging arcade drift physics RC Bonus
